articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD Reversal Might be Premature. Eyes on Fed, GDP and PCE - DailyFX
articles.description: Gold prices rallied this past week, but markets might be getting ahead of themselves. A hawkish Federal Reserve, US GDP and PCE data could weigh against XAU/USD in the week ahead.
